verses.verse: Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%> that you <S%H4672>find<s%>; <S%H398>eat<s%> this <S%H4039>roll<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
So I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and he caused me to <S%H398>eat<s%> that <S%H4039>roll<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, cause your <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H4578>bowels<s%> with this <S%H4039>roll<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H398>you<s%>. Then did I eat <S%H6310>it<s%>; and it was in my mouth as <S%H1706>honey<s%> for <S%H4966>sweetness<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H935>get<s%> you unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> with my words unto <S%H1697>them<s%>.

For you are not <S%H7971>sent<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of a <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language<s%>, but to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

Not to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of a <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language<s%>, whose <S%H1697>words<s%> you can not <S%H8085>understand<s%>. <S%H7971>Surely<s%>, had I sent you to <S%H8085>them<s%>, they would have listened unto you.

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H14>you<s%>; for they will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H1004>me<s%>: for all the house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H2389>impudent<s%> and <S%H7186>hardhearted<s%>.

<S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I have made your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%>, and your <S%H4696>forehead<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H4696>foreheads<s%>.

As a <S%H8068>diamond<s%> <S%H2389>harder<s%> than <S%H6864>flint<s%> have I <S%H5414>made<s%> your <S%H4696>forehead<s%>: <S%H3372>fear<s%> them <S%H2865>not<s%>, neither be dismayed at their <S%H6440>looks<s%>, though they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, all my <S%H1697>words<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto you <S%H3947>receive<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%>.

And <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H935>get<s%> you to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, and tell <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; whether they will <S%H8085>hear<s%>, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>.

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> took me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> me a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing<s%>, <S%H1288>saying<s%>, Blessed be the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from his <S%H4725>place<s%>.

I heard also the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> that <S%H5401>touched<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H269>another<s%>, and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H6963>them<s%>, and a noise of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing<s%>.

So the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and took me <S%H3947>away<s%>, and I <S%H3212>went<s%> in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%>, in the <S%H2534>heat<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>; but the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was strong upon <S%H2388>me<s%>.

Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> at <S%H8512>Tel<s%>â€“abib, that <S%H3427>lived<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>, and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> where they <S%H3427>sat<s%>, and <S%H3427>remained<s%> there <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
And it came to pass at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and give them warning from <S%H2094>me<s%>.

When I <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, You shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>; and you give him not <S%H2094>warning<s%>, nor <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, to save his <S%H2421>life<s%>; the same <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Yet if you <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and he <S%H7725>turn<s%> not from his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, nor from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; but you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

<S%H7725>Again<s%>, When a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man does <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, and I <S%H5414>lay<s%> a <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4191>him<s%>, he shall die: because you have not given him <S%H2094>warning<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> which he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>; but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Nevertheless if you <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%>, that the righteous <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H2398>not<s%>, and he does not sin, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, because he is <S%H2094>warned<s%>; also you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was there upon <S%H559>me<s%>; and he said unto <S%H6965>me<s%>, Arise, go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H1237>plain<s%>, and I will there talk with <S%H1696>you<s%>.

Then I <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H1237>plain<s%>: <S%H3519>and<s%>, behold, the glory of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3519>there<s%>, as the glory which I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>: and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H5975>me<s%>, and set me upon my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H559>me<s%>, and said unto <S%H935>me<s%>, Go, <S%H5462>shut<s%> yourself <S%H8432>inside<s%> your <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But <S%H1121>you<s%>, O son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5414>behold<s%>, they shall put <S%H5688>bands<s%> upon <S%H631>you<s%>, and shall bind you with <S%H3318>them<s%>, and you shall not go out among <S%H8432>them<s%>:

And I will make your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to the roof of your <S%H2441>mouth<s%>, that you shall be <S%H481>mute<s%>, and shall not be to them a <S%H376>reprover<s%>: for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H6605>you<s%>, I will open your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; He that <S%H8085>hears<s%>, let him <S%H8085>hear<s%>; and he that <S%H2310>forbears<s%>, let him <S%H2308>forbear<s%>: for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
